FuncDef: The display iqcn statistics command displays statistics about CNP packets proactively sent by an iQCN-enabled device. The display iqcn statistics command displays statistics about CNP packets proactively sent by an iQCN-enabled device. This command is supported only on the CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE8850-SAN, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P and CE8850-HAM.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a slot ID.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces.
